terms.meaning: AI systems mein unfair discrimination ya prejudice.
terms.example: Hiring AI mein gender ya race bias.

terms.meaning: AI systems ka equal treatment provide karna.
terms.example: Loan approval mein demographic fairness.

terms.meaning: AI decisions ko human-understandable way mein explain karna.
terms.example: Medical diagnosis mein reasoning provide karna.

terms.meaning: Model ki working aur decisions understand kar sakna.
terms.example: Black box models ko interpretable banana.

terms.meaning: AI systems ki working clear aur open hona.
terms.example: Algorithm details publicly available hona.

terms.meaning: AI decisions ke liye responsibility lena.
terms.example: Autonomous car accident mein liability.

terms.meaning: Personal data ki protection aur confidentiality.
terms.example: User data misuse se bachana.

terms.meaning: Sensitive information ko unauthorized access se bachana.
terms.example: GDPR compliance for user data.

terms.meaning: Data use karne ke liye user ki permission lena.
terms.example: Cookies acceptance, data sharing agreement.

terms.meaning: Data se personal identifiers remove karna.
terms.example: Medical research mein patient identity hide karna.

terms.meaning: Individual privacy maintain karte hue aggregate insights nikalna.
terms.example: Census data analysis without revealing individuals.

terms.meaning: Data share kiye bina distributed learning.
terms.example: Mobile phones pe local training, central aggregation.

terms.meaning: AI models ko fool karne ke liye designed inputs.
terms.example: Image mein invisible changes se misclassification.

terms.meaning: AI system ka unexpected inputs handle kar sakna.
terms.example: Noisy data ya adversarial examples ke against stability.

terms.meaning: AI systems ko harmful outcomes se prevent karna.
terms.example: Autonomous vehicles mein safety measures.

terms.meaning: AI decisions mein human oversight aur intervention.
terms.example: Medical diagnosis mein doctor final approval.

terms.meaning: AI systems se unfair bias remove karne ke techniques.
terms.example: Training data balance karna, fairness constraints.

terms.meaning: AI systems ki fairness aur performance regularly check karna.
terms.example: Hiring algorithms ki bias testing.

terms.meaning: Technology access mein inequality.
terms.example: Rural areas mein internet connectivity issues.

terms.meaning: AI development aur deployment ke liye rules aur policies.
terms.example: Government regulations for AI use in healthcare.

terms.meaning: Machine Learning Operations, ML models ko production mein deploy karna.
terms.example: Model training se deployment tak complete pipeline.

terms.meaning: Trained model ko production environment mein use ke liye setup karna.
terms.example: Web API through model serve karna.

terms.meaning: Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment for ML pipelines.
terms.example: Automated testing aur deployment of ML models.

terms.meaning: Production mein model performance track karna.
terms.example: Accuracy drift, data drift detect karna.

terms.meaning: Production data ka training data se different ho jana.
terms.example: User behavior change se input distribution shift.

terms.meaning: Time ke saath model performance degrade hona.
terms.example: Market conditions change se prediction accuracy drop.

terms.meaning: Do models ya strategies compare karne ka method.
terms.example: New recommendation algorithm vs old one test karna.

terms.meaning: ML features ko centrally store aur manage karna.
terms.example: Reusable features for multiple models.

terms.meaning: Trained models ko version control ke saath store karna.
terms.example: Different model versions track karna.

terms.meaning: Application aur dependencies ko package karna.
terms.example: Docker container mein ML model deploy karna.

terms.meaning: Container orchestration platform for scalable deployment.
terms.example: Multiple ML services manage karna.

terms.meaning: Application ko small, independent services mein divide karna.
terms.example: Separate services for data processing, model inference.

terms.meaning: Application Programming Interface for model access.
terms.example: REST API through model predictions serve karna.

terms.meaning: Multiple servers mein traffic distribute karna.
terms.example: High traffic handle karne ke liye multiple model instances.

terms.meaning: System ka demand increase ke saath grow kar sakna.
terms.example: Auto-scaling based on prediction requests.

terms.meaning: Request se response tak ka time delay.
terms.example: Real-time predictions mein low latency important hai.

terms.meaning: Unit time mein kitne requests handle kar sakte hain.
terms.example: Per second kitne predictions serve kar sakte hain.

terms.meaning: Data source ke paas processing karna.
terms.example: Mobile device pe local ML inference.

terms.meaning: Model size reduce karna deployment ke liye.
terms.example: Quantization, pruning techniques use karna.

terms.meaning: Server management ke bina code run karna.
terms.example: AWS Lambda pe ML model deploy karna.
